definitions.definition: In some columns , that part of the capital between the termination of the shaft and the annulet of the echinus , or the space between two neck moldings.
Synonym of gorget ( “ wimple (clothing); necklace, neck-ornamentation ” ) .

main_definition: ( architecture ) In some columns , that part of the capital between the termination of the shaft and the annulet of the echinus , or the space between two neck moldings.
secondary_definitions: Synonym of gorget ( “ wimple (clothing); necklace, neck-ornamentation ” ) .
